mapper.select: SELECT A.ID AS MATCHING_ID , A.CREATED_DATE_AT , A.IS_COMPLETED , A.LEVEL_RANGE , A.MEMBER_ID , B.ID AS TECHNOLOGY_ID , B.NAME , B.IS_DELETED , B.REF_TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID FROM MATCHING A JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY B ON A.TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = B.ID WHERE A.IS_COMPLETED = 'N' ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT A.ID AS MATCHING_ID , A.CREATED_DATE_AT , A.IS_COMPLETED , A.LEVEL_RANGE , A.MEMBER_ID , B.ID AS TECHNOLOGY_ID , B.NAME , B.IS_DELETED , B.REF_TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID FROM MATCHING A JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY B ON A.TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = B.ID WHERE A.IS_COMPLETED = 'N' AND A.ID = #{matchingId} ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT A.ID AS MATCHING_ID , A.CREATED_DATE_AT , A.IS_COMPLETED , A.LEVEL_RANGE , A.MEMBER_ID , B.ID AS TECHNOLOGY_ID , B.NAME , B.IS_DELETED , B.REF_TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID FROM MATCHING A JOIN TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY B ON A.TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = B.ID WHERE (B.ID = #{technologyCategoryId} OR B.REF_TECHNOLOGY_CATEGORY_ID = #{technologyCategoryId}) AND A.IS_COMPLETED = 'N' AND B.IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY 1 DESC
SELECT A.ID AS MATCHING_ENTRY_ID , A.APPLIED_DATE_AT , A.IS_CANCELED , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MATCHING_ID FROM MATCHING_ENTRY A WHERE A.IS_CANCELED = 'N' AND A.MATCHING_ID = #{matchingId}
